p: Sera samples were obtained from ten patients with suspected dengue fever from the districts of Vassouras, Volta Redonda, Nova Iguaçu e Mangaratiba (west of the state of Rio de Janeiro), between January and March of the current year. They were sent to the Central Laboratory of Rio de Janeiro LACEN/RJ for diagnostic confirmation through RT-PCR under Lanciotti´s protocol [ 27]. DENV-2 strain 40247 (Produced by Bio-Manguinhos/FIOCRUZ, RJ) [ 28] was employed as a positive control, while a normal human serum sample collected from a healthy donor was used as a negative one.
